HISTORY
=======

0.3.1 - 2010-04-19
------------------

- add example usage for PloneFLTestCase
  [amleczko]

- pin collective.funkload to version>0.2 
  [amleczko]


0.3 - 2009-11-23
----------------

- enable test recorder from funkload
  [amleczko]

- update doctests
  [amleczko]

0.2 - 2009-11-01
----------------

- enable funkload bench to run tests in released eggs [toutpt]

0.1 - 2009-08-09
----------------

- Initial release
- Added funkload script [evilbungle]
- Added automatic report generation [evilbungle]
